additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Each tablet contains: Magnesium Hydroxide 400mg, Aluminium Hydroxide-Dried 400mg, Simethicone 30mg, Also contains Saccharin Sodium and Lactose., Aluminium Hydroxide- Dried 400 mg (equivalent to 50% Aluminium Oxide, Anhydrous (AI_O_)), Magnesium Hydroxide 400 mg, Simethicone 40 mg, Sucrose, Mannitol (2.88 g/12 tablets)

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Do not use  if you are hypersensitive to any of the ingredients  within 2 hours of taking ANY other medication  if carton seal is broken or missing, or if tablet foil is broken.

description: Mylanta 2Go Double Strength Antacid Tablets Lemon Mint
name: 2Go Double Strength Antacid Tablets Lemon Mint
